doc:
Kirk Baily https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kirk_Baily 0 Kirk Baily (born February 2, 1963 in New York City, New York) is an American actor and voice actor. He is best known for his role as Kevin "Ug" Lee in the Nickelodeon sitcom, Salute Your Shorts. He is also an accomplished voice actor who has appeared in anime and video games. He also does ADR looping for film and television. Kirk_Baily ( born February_2_,_1963 in New_York_City , New_York ) is an_American_actor_and_voice_actor . He is_best_known for his_role as Kevin_"_Ug_"_Lee in the_Nickelodeon_sitcom , Salute_Your_Shorts . He is also an_accomplished_voice_actor who has_appeared in anime_and_video_games . He also does ADR looping for film_and_television .
